name: Dormiveglia
description:
Dormiveglia, the space that stretches between sleeping and waking. 

Dormiveglia is a 2D puzzle game. The story set in America and tells the story of a mother and daughter from the 1940s to the 1950s. In the game, you need to explore the room of different periods and collect clues to make collage art. As the game progresses, you will gradually learn their story.

Are you willing to be a painful lunatic, or a happy fool?

* This game is not for profit. Most of the game art and photos are from the Internet and manipulated by me. If it constitutes infringement, please contact me and I will take down the game. Sorry and thanks again!
